reviewText: Fun video. Bought for school library.
Wouldn't work on any of my DVD players. I had to return, tried another and same thing.
The video is too old it needs to be updated

This is one of the DVDs we have used as a presentation as part of our DAR (Daughters of the American Revolution) chapter meetings, and it has gone over pretty well. While more directed toward school kids, it is not so 'kidified' that adults feel they are being talked down to.

One of the best teaching tool for those who know virtually very little or nothing about our constitution (which could describe a large number of Americans.)  Can be difficult for those who really are not interested in learning anything or those who need more pictures than words in order to keep up.  This is an educational tool.  If you want something more, your in the wrong place.
This DVD has well organized content, but far too many talking heads.  It is very dull.
